hi i downloaded the game put copied the files into the actual saboteur file and clicked saboteur and now it's asking me to insert the disk, help?

i did everything and whenever i start the game it starts up and stays on the loading... screen and never goes to the main menu

Hello,


First try to close all software running on the background, especially downloading software, like uTorrent and Bittorrent clients. If that didn't help, try the following:

1. Uninstall the Game.
2. Restart your PC. (!)
3. Reinstall the Game.
4. See if it works now.

Hey i really need help. I download the game with bittorrent but the EAsetup says i need to insert a CD and Saboteur Application says the program cant be started because bink32.dll is missing from your computer? please help

Hello,

 Download the missing .dll file from www.dll-files.com and the drag & drop it to: C:\Windows\System32.
